profileAlternative.name: Weili Geng
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Data Analyst at Netflix
profileAlternative.summary:
8 years of experience in analyzing user data, extracting business insights, building business recommendations, testing new product ideas, and communicating findings to various stakeholders.

1. Technical Data Analysis Skills
• Expert on SQL, Hadoop, Tableau, Microstrategy and various business analytics tools
• Familiar with Statistical Testing using R and Python

2. Client Facing Skills
• Have done numerous presentations with data insights and business recommendations to both internal management teams and external clients including 10+ fortune 100 companies

aboutAlternative.text:
8 years of experience in analyzing user data, extracting business insights, building business recommendations, testing new product ideas, and communicating findings to various stakeholders.

1. Technical Data Analysis Skills
• Expert on SQL, Hadoop, Tableau, Microstrategy and various business analytics tools
• Familiar with Statistical Testing using R and Python

2. Client Facing Skills
• Have done numerous presentations with data insights and business recommendations to both internal management teams and external clients including 10+ fortune 100 companies

given.text:
I'm managed Weili as an analyst at Google and it's been an absolute pleasure to work with her.
Weili is a fast learner, curious, hard working and proactive. She often went above and beyond her duties with limited guidance. She's a natural analyst, with great data science skills and a constant thrive to understand the business and how it can benefit from her work. Weili worked extremely well with others on the team and kept pushing both herself and the team to deliver better results faster.
I was also impressed by Weili's willingness to "get her hands dirty", working on a project with a fellow Googler, she took on herself to rewrite portions of the relevant data pipelines to improve the performance of one of our systems.
See less

Weili is one of the most talented people at Twitter. She is a great team player who has a proven analytics background and experience presenting her research to key stakeholders. Weili has grown into a leader during the past three years at Twitter. I would certainly recommend her to any organization or team.
